name: Maxi Matic USA MST-900VW 8. 5 Qt.  Slow Cooker White
categoryPath: Home/Appliances/Kitchen Appliances/Slow Cookers, Rice Cookers & Steamers

reviews.name: Elite Cuisine 8.5-Quart Slow Cooker, White
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because I was looking for a large slow cooker that I could use to prepare huge meals in. I have only used it one time so far but I love it. The only down side is that the outside gets very warm so you want to make sure you place it on a hard surface and keep anything away from it that might burn and the lid does not have a seal around it but it did not seem to lose any moisture or steam inside. I used it to make chicken and dumplings in and they turned out great. I would recommend this to anyone who is looking for a large slow cooker and wants to pay a fair price for it.
reviews.title: Great Product for the price.

reviews.name: Elite Cuisine 8.5-Quart Slow Cooker, White
reviews.reviewText: Got this because of the nice size. It is a great size but when I got in the lid does not fit flat which would have allowed all of the heat to escape. Returned it without even trying it. Realized afterwards that a lot of the other reviews said the same thing.
reviews.title: not worth it

reviews.name: Elite Cuisine 8.5-Quart Slow Cooker, White
reviews.reviewText: This is the PERFECT size for cooking a large amount of meatballs ~!~
reviews.title: LOVE IT ~!~

reviews.reviewText: cooks fast and lots of room for all meals.
